Abstract: Thomas Francis Lambert Jr, law professor and dean who served as trial lawyer for International Military Tribunal at Nuremberg, dies at age of 85 (M)
Snippet: Thomas Francis Lambert Jr, law professor and dean who served as trial lawyer for International Military Tribunal at Nuremberg, dies at age of 85 (M)
LeadParagraph: Thomas Francis Lambert Jr., a law professor and dean who served as a trial lawyer for the International Military Tribunal at Nuremberg after the defeat of Nazi Germany, died on Wednesday at his home in Boston. He was 85.

Headline.Main: T. F. Lambert Jr., 85, Lawyer at Nuremberg
Headline.PrintHeadline: T. F. Lambert Jr., 85, Lawyer at Nuremberg
